dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Monoammonium phosphate; MAP; Ammonium phosphate monobasic; Ammonium biphosphate; Ammonium acid phosphate; Primary ammonium phosphate; Ammonium dihydrate phosphate; NH4H2PO4
Monoammonium phosphate; MAP; Ammonium phosphate monobasic; Ammonium biphosphate; Ammonium acid phosphate; Primary ammonium phosphate; Ammonium dihydrate phosphate; NH4H2PO4
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Ammonium dihydrogen phosphate is a chemical compound commonly used as a fertilizer, flame retardant, and a nutrient in yeast fermentation. The product flow involves its processing into a usable form, adherence to industry standards, maintained quality, and various applications in agricultural and industrial production. It is synthesized through the reaction of ammonia with phosphoric acid, and the primary educt is phosphoric acid. Typically, it is part of a production mix at the manufacturing site and available as a commercial product 'at plant' or 'to consumer'.
磷酸二氢铵是一种常用作肥料、阻燃剂和酵母发酵营养源的化学化合物。产品流程包括将其加工成可用形式，遵守行业标准，维护质量，以及在农业和工业生产中的多种应用。它是通过与磷酸的氨反应合成的，主要原料是磷酸。通常，它是制造现场生产混合物的一部分，并且作为商业产品在工厂或消费者处可用。
